row.process: :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# = "PARAM:" :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL#, '"', '""') : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED#, '`', '``') Write-Host "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED#" : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED#, '%', '%%') echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED#" : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL#" :ENDIF
